prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has a sleek elongated body and sharp fins.
Imagine a Pokemon with vibrant blue scales and an elegant serpentine shape.
Show me a creature that combines aquatic features with a dragon-like appearance.
Generate a design for a Pokemon that thrives in both water and coastal habitats.
Make a fantasy water creature with spiky fins and a graceful swimming motion.
Give me an illustration of a Pokemon that resembles a sea horse but with a more powerful look.
Design a Pokemon with luminous blue colors and intricate fins that shimmer in the light.
